page.title: 12 Leisure Survey
page.content: On Wednesday we went to Sevenoaks High Street to do a survey on leisure. Mrs Samways went with us and she started us off. Lots of people were very pleased to help us but some people could not be bothered. 28 out of 37 people enjoy reading, 20 of the people we asked lived in Sevenoaks and out of reading most people liked non fiction. The most popular sports are football and tennis. The most popular T.V. programmes are Wild Life and The News. We interviewed 9 men and 28 women. The most unpopular way of passing spare time was jogging. Altogether we interviewed 37 people. 2 out of 4 people use the new swimming pool.
